item.title: Macros
item.description: Added ability to use IFDEF and IFNDEF for record labels declarations.

item.title: Plexer
item.description: Added flag "Plexer.utf8_lexing" to specify that the lexer built by "Plexer.gmake ()" should take utf8 punctuation characters into account.

item.title: quotation example
item.description: Fixed example in chapter "Quotations" about lambda terms. Did not work because using an old version of the "lexer" syntax extension.

item.title: pprintf
item.description: Added chapter about the new statement "pprintf".

item.title: Grammar.Entry.parse_all
item.description: Added function "Grammar.Entry.parse_all".

item.title: Pretty print
item.description: Added function "Pretty.horizontally" returning the fact that the current print is horizontal or not. Added function "Prtools.hvlistl" using "hlistl" or "vlistl" according to the fact that the current print is horizontal or not.

item.title: Located exceptions
item.description: Explained in a new section "Located errors" how put locations to exceptions raised in quotations expanders.

item.title: Backtracking example
item.description: Added an example of backtracking.

item.title: Fstream and Grammar library modules
item.description: In Fstream module, added section about backtracking parsers. Grammar module, added section about parsing algorithm. They are new features of Camlp5 5.04.

item.title: Backtracking parsers
item.description: Added chapter about backtracking parsers, a new feature of Camlp5 5.04.

item.title: mkcamlp5
item.description: Added paragraph about new commands mkcamlp5 and mkcamlp5.opt.

item.title: Lexers 2
item.description: Updated the chapter about lexers, the lexing buffer being now provided in Camlp5 library, instead of having to be written by the programmer.

item.title: Lexers
item.description: Changed the chapter about lexers, their syntax being changed.

item.title: Future work
item.description: Deleted section about the rewritting of the pretty print in Scheme syntax (this is implemented). Added section about GLR grammars.

item.title: Locations in quotations and antiquotations
item.description: Added detailed explanations about the problem of locations in quotations and antiquotations.

item.title: Module Diff and Equilibrated pretty print
item.description: Added module Diff in Camlp5 library to compare two arrays (using the algorithm of the Unix 'diff' command). Added flag 'E' in pretty print kit in revised syntax (pr_o.cmo) to allow display equilibrate cases (all cases in 'match' statement are cut if one is cut, and same equilibration in 'if' statement).

item.title: SLIST0...
item.description: Deleted section about internal extensions SLIST0, SLIST1, SOPT and SFLAG, which are not yet supported.

item.title: Syntax tree - strict mode - nodes without quotations
item.description: Added a section about types of nodes without quotations: type_var, type_decl and class_infos.

item.title: Syntax tree - strict mode - 2
item.description: Updated doc of 'patt', 'ctyp', 'str_item' and 'sig_item'.

item.title: Version number
item.description: New version number will be 5.00 instead of 4.09, because the AST quotations in user syntax is a major change.

item.title: Syntax tree - strict mode - 1
item.description: General antiquoting will start with "_" (underscore) instead of "a".

item.title: Syntax tree - strict mode
item.description: Trying a different display for the "expr" quotation, the displaying with a table being to wide.

item.title: Syntax tree - 3
item.description: Improved the text of the description of the chapters about syntax tree nodes in strict and in transitional modes. Added a chapter (empty for the moment) where the quotation kit "q_ast.cmo" (AST quotations in user syntax) will be specifically described.

item.title: Syntax tree - 2
item.description: Separated the "syntax tree in strict mode" and "syntax tree in transitional mode" into two chapters.

item.title: Syntax tree - 1
item.description: Added section about the syntax tree in "strict" mode, actually almost a copy of the section in "transitional" mode.

item.title: Future work
item.description: Changed intro sentence. Deleted section "extensible syntax tree quotations" (implemented). Added section "rewritting pretty printer in Scheme syntax".

item.title: Syntax tree
item.description: Changed structure of this chapter. Added introduction to explain the general differences between "transitional" and "strict" modes. Put the rest inside a section "syntax tree in transitional mode". Added a section "syntax tree in strict mode" (to be completed).

item.title: Library - module Ploc
item.description: Explained that this module also contains pervasive type and function. Commented the pervasive type Ploc.vala and added the pervasive function Ploc.call_with.

item.title: Transitional and Strict - 1
item.description: Added more explanations about the two modes, and a short example of what the syntax tree quotation "q_ast.cmo" allows to do.

item.title: Transitional and Strict
item.description: Added chapter about "strict" and "transitional", allowing to choose between backward compatibility and a new feature: the syntax tree quotations in user syntax ("q_ast.cmo").
